devdoc.author: Guillaume Dupont, Sami Darnaud, Solal Dunckel, Theo Palhol
devdoc.custom:experimental: This is an experimental contract. It should not be used in production.

params.child: is the address of the child.
params.config: contains various element of the config: periodicity, indexToken and ceiling

params.amount: is the number of tokens that the child's account should be credited.
params.child: is the address of the child.

params.amount: is the amount of tokens to add.
params.child: is the address of the child.

params.amount: is the amount of tokens to add.
params.child: is the address of the child.

params.newAddr: is the new address of your child.
params.oldAddr: is the previous address of your child.

params.ceiling: is the amount of token the child can claim.
params.child: is the address of the child.
params.periodicity: is the time that must pass between each claim, in seconds.

params.newAddr: is the address of the child.

computeClaimable(address).details: Computes the amount of token the child can claim.

params.child: is the child for which we compute the claimable amount.

params.parent: The address of the parent account

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeChild(address).details: This function properly updates the parentToChildren array by removing the address of the child and making sure there is no gap inside the array.

params.child: is the address of the child.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.child: the child to activate or desactivate the account.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: is the amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.child: is the address of the child.

devdoc.title: A pocket money faucet

addChild(address,(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Add a child to a parent address

addChildAndFundsPermit(address,(uint256,.notice: Add a child to a parent address + add funds to the child account.

changeChildAddress(address,address).notice: This will change your child address: `oldAddr` is now `newAddr`.

changeConfig(address,uint256,uint256).notice: This will set your child: `child` config to the following values: ceiling: `ceiling`, periodicity: `periodicity`.

changeParentAddr(address).notice: You will change your address from `_msgSender()` to `newAddr`

claim().notice: You will receive the pocket money your parent deposited for you.

getNumberChildren(address).notice: This returns the number of children asssociated to an address

removeChild(address).notice: Removes `child` from your account and transfers all the founds associated to him to your address.

setActive(bool,address).notice: This transaction will set the active variable to `active`. If the value is false, your child: `child` won't be able to claim anymore.

withdrawFundsFromChild(uint256,address).notice: You will withdraw `amount` from your child account `child`. If amount is 0, it will wihdraw all its balance.
